column4: Hi, I am new to nix in general and just added the Ubuntu Studio theme to Gutsy and am curious to what else I am missing out on, I know that there are multiple flavors of linux and I was just curious to check some others out, could some one name some of the other popular distros?
with linux - it pays to stick with one and learn the linux fundamentals. not jump disrtos every other day.
agreed thats why I want to explore in my early stages before I get to set in my ways
however the Live cd's of "DSL" and "Puppylinux" are worth grabbing.
